name: wid5_F2F3_module5
label: F2F 3: child's medical records (CAPI)
description: This questionnaire module contains questions on: Apgar-score; child's medical records U-Heft (photo or questionnaire): selected parameters from examination U1 to U9.

nbi1300.name: nbi1300
